title: Minimap headaches and rage
body: It has bothered me for a while now about how pings show up on the minimap.  Could, for instance, the visual of pings within a radius be drawn into a central position of the first ping?  As a lazy player I tend to look at my map when I hear a ping but this becomes very hard when one particular teammate thinks they need to be a goon and spam ping a bush because someone was spotted crossing a ward.  Rather than a mass of big red 'get your butt back to base' blips blocking what champ was there can we make it more a rapid pulsing sort of ping to keep visibility up?

replies.body: I think a better solution to this problem and many others is reducing the amount of ping spams to 3, with the same CD.
I do like this idea as well, but without being able to see it in game I could not say how much it would help.
